getSubGrid

public byte[] getSubGrid(int x,
                         int y)
Get Sub Grid Returns the sub grid in which the x and y coordinates are located. The coordinates can be located anywhere in the subgrid.

Parameters:
x - coordinate
y - coordinate
Returns:
a byte array of the subgrid

setSubGrid

public void setSubGrid(int x,
                       int y,
                       byte[] inData)
Set Sub Grid The coordinates can be located at any point in the sub grid

Parameters:
x - coordinate
y - coordinate
inData - Takes a byte array and sets the specified subgrid's values to that sub grid at the specified coordinates
